reviewText: I never get tired of hearing of this true story.  It is very powerful to watch.  It is worth it all to serve Christ.  These two ABWE missionaries were willing to give all for the name of Jesus Christ.  Christ is truly the reason why it is Worth it all.  He died for our sins, and sometimes His greater plan for His kingdom is that we give our lives for Him.  He is in control no matter what happens.  It is Worth it All to live for Christ.  He is the King of kings and Lord of lords.
